DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this randomized study was to assess the effectiveness of endomyocardial botulinum toxin injection for preventing post-procedural atrial fibrillation in patients undergoing the radiofrequency ablation of atrial flutter.
DOC.brief_title: Radiofrequency Ablation Plus Botulinum Toxin Injection Versus Radiofrequency Ablation Only in Patients With Atrial Flutter
